contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 15, 1891 D Port Sunlight Contest
Port Sunlight Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
port-sunlight-contest
None
Thornton Manor, Port Sunlight, Cheshire Contest organised at fete for employees of W.H.Lever of Port Sunlight Works. Held at Lever's home. 7 bands competed.
Dec. 4, 2017, 11:43 a.m. Dec. 4, 2017, 12:22 p.m.
1 Skelmersdale Old William Rimmer The Bohemian Girl (arr. Rimmer)
2 Widnes Wesleyan William Rimmer Linda di Chamounix [unknown arranger]
3 Gossage Soap Works J. Tomlinson The Bohemian Girl [unknown arranger]
4 Tranmere Temperance George Allen The Bohemian Girl [unknown arranger]
5 Warrington Catholic T. Meredith Nonpareil
6 Birkenhead Borough W. J. Bryant Romeo and Juliet [unknown composer, unknown arranger]
7 Birkenhead Mission T. Jenkins Starry Crown of Heaven
